      • addUser

        public boolean addUser(java.lang.String name1,
                       java.lang.String email1,
                       java.lang.String password1,
                       int age1,
                       java.lang.String major1,
                       int year1)
        Adds a user to the database
        Parameters:
        name1 - The name of the new user
        email1 - The email of the new user
        password1 - The password of the new user
        age1 - The age of the new user
        major1 - The college major of the new user
        year1 - The graduation year of the new user
        Returns:
        True if the user is added successfully, false if this user already exists

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves any changed information back to the database. This usually isn't necissary because the methods for modifying the database will do that automatically.

      • getUserByEmail

        public User getUserByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Searches the database to find a user by email
        Parameters:
        email - Email address of the user you are searching for
        Returns:
        the User object if it exists, otherwise null

      • getUserByID

        public User getUserByID(int id)
        Searches the database to find a user by ID
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user you are searching for
        Returns:
        the User object if it exists, otherwise null

      • removeUser

        public boolean removeUser(int id)
        Removes a user from the database by ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the user you want to remove
        Returns:
        true if the user was removed and false if the user doesn't exist

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(int id,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Posts a message to the public message board and saves it in the database
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user who is posting the message
        message - The message you want to add to the message board

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(User u,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Posts a message to the public message board and saves it in the database
        Parameters:
        u - the User object of the user who is posting the message
        message - The message you want to add to the message board

        Parameters:
